quote_last: “Michael, you look marvelous. It’s so good to see you again. I really mean that. The years have treated you well.” Eva Borodin leaned back against the gray fabric of the Saab’s headrest and appraised him.
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_last: Events were getting serious enough that the operation had been moved down to the Situation Room, in the White House basement.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
